name: HMCameraProfile
desc: A camera profile that interacts with an accessory's camera.

items.name: var settingsControl: HMCameraSettingsControl?
items.desc: Controls the settings on the camera.

items.name: class HMCameraSettingsControl
items.desc: An object that represents the ability to control a camera's settings.

items.name: class HMCameraControl
items.desc: An abstract class that represents a camera control.

items.name: var microphoneControl: HMCameraAudioControl?
items.desc: Controls the microphone settings on the camera.

items.name: var speakerControl: HMCameraAudioControl?
items.desc: Controls the speaker settings on the camera.

items.name: class HMCameraAudioControl
items.desc: An object that controls a camera's audio settings.

items.name: class HMCameraStreamControl
items.desc: An object that can start and stop the camera stream and contains the view into which the stream is rendered.

items.name: class HMCameraSnapshotControl
items.desc: An object that can take an image snapshot from a camera.
